name: Pregnant Mother Anime Games:Pregnant Mom Simulator
name_original: Pregnant Mother Anime Games:Pregnant Mom Simulator
description:
A simulation game where a girl gets to know that she is going to have a baby sooner. This expectant mother is very happy to listen to this news. The virtual dad in this game is also very excited to hear this news. This baby is going to be a happy addition to the virtual family. 
Good news should be shared with friends and family also. Have a nice party at your house, tell your friends that I’m pregnant. Go for a gender-revealing ceremony. You will have full control over your virtual pregnant mother sim. Do what feels best for mom and baby. Deal with all of the mother queries in this pregnant mother game. After all the care & responsibility, here comes your angel Baby after 9 months who might be a girl or a boy. Have fun with your angel baby in this dream virtual happy family simulator.
